components.description:
A narrow lightweight water vessel that is usually pointed on both ends and made of either wood or plastic.

Generally depicted with a paddle.
components.title: Canoe

description:
A narrow lightweight water vessel that is usually pointed on both ends and made of either wood or plastic.

Generally depicted with a paddle.
title: Canoe

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.definition: Canoe was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy ?? New inÂ iOS 10.2 http://emojipedia.org/canoe/
emoji_net_data.name: canoe

bn:00093229v: To traverse or travel by ship on a body of water.
Traverse or travel on (a body of water)
To be impelled or driven forward by the action of wind upon sails, as a ship on water; to be impelled on a body of water by steam or other power.

bn:00015316n: A small long and narrow boat, propelled by one or more people (depending on the size of canoe), using single-bladed paddles. The paddlers face in the direction of travel, in either a seated position, or kneeling on the bottom of the boat. Canoes are open on top, and pointed at both ends.
Small and light boat; pointed at both ends; propelled with a paddle
A canoe is a lightweight narrow boat, typically pointed at both ends and open on top, propelled by one or more seated or kneeling paddlers facing the direction of travel using a single-bladed paddle.
A light narrow boat driven by a paddle.

bn:00011674n: A boat is a watercraft, usually smaller than most ships.
A watercraft designed to float or plane on, and provide transport over water.
A boat is a watercraft of any size designed to float or plane, to work or travel on water.
A small vessel for travel on water
